headers.subject: [tosdr:2109] [note] Tumblr keeps token; doesn't store passwords to Third Party Services

html:
You may also be required to engage in an authorization process with each of those Third Party Services, where we receive a token that allows us to access those accounts so that we can, for example, when you choose, post your Tumblr content, or links to your Tumblr content, to those services. We do not receive or store your passwords for your Third Party Service accounts.

http://www.tumblr.com/policy/en/privacy 

--
tosdr.org | twitter.com/tosdr | github.com/tosdr
---

subject: [note] Tumblr keeps token; doesn't store passwords to Third Party Services
text:
>
> You may also be required to engage in an authorization process with each 
> of those Third Party Services, where we receive a token that allows us to 
> access those accounts so that we can, for example, when you choose, post 
> your Tumblr content, or links to your Tumblr content, to those services. We 
> do not receive or store your passwords for your Third Party Service 
> accounts.


http://www.tumblr.com/policy/en/privacy 

--
